title: Eureka, California
summary: Eureka (Wiyot: Jaroujiji,[17] Hupa: do'-wi-lotl-ding,[18] Karuk: uuth[19]) is the principal city and county seat of Humboldt County in the Redwood Empire region of California. The city is located on U.S. Route 101 on the shores of Humboldt Bay, 270 miles (435 km) north of San Francisco and 100 miles (161 km) south of the Oregon border.[20] At the 2010 census, the population of the city was 27,191,[21][22][23] and the population of Greater Eureka[24][25] was 45,034.[14]
